articles.author: Lisa Kailai Han
articles.title: Stock futures rise after Trump says Iran-Israel ceasefire is in effect: Live updates - CNBC
articles.description: All three major averages rose on Monday, despite Iran's retaliatory attack on an American military base in Qatar.
articles.content:
Stock futures rose early Tuesday after President Donald Trump said that a ceasefire between Israel and Iran had come into effect, marking the latest sign of easing tensions in the Middle East.
